activities: We collect and retain employee data  for staff administration purposes as well as accounts and records. Information is also submitted to us through the website through either the "Contact Us" form or through registering a profile to apply for employment.  The information provided through our website is sent to us. With regard to the submission of information pertaining to any job vacancy, we may use the information provided to assess an applicant's suitability for the role or any other role we have open. We may provide their the applicant's skills better match their needs than the division applied to. The contact information submitted through the "Contact Us" form is transferred to the company through an email and is subject to our email retention and disposal policy. The information submitted to a registered profile by a job applicant is retained until the applicant requests to de-register from the site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee data. data provided by visitors to the website who use the "Contact Us" form of who register a profile to apply for a job vacancy
